alert.note: Alert for Bates; Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 31 at 8:38AM CDT until further notice by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Missouri... Little Osage River near Horton affecting Vernon County. Osage River near Schell City affecting Vernon and Bates Counties. .Heavy rainfall expected today and Wednesday will cause the river levels to rise above flood stage. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Osage River near Schell City. * WHEN...From Thursday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 31.5 feet, the main road of the Schell Osage Conservation Area floods west of the conservation office. The north campground main road of the Schell Osage Conservation area floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 28.0 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. this afternoon at 445 PM CDT.
